cluck.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a chicken clucks, it makes a short low sound
cluck.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to express sympathy or disapproval by saying something, or by making a short low noise with your tongue
cluck.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She stood clucking over the baby.
cluck.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a low short noise made by chickens
cluck.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a sound made with your tongue, used to show disapproval or sympathy
